title: School
description: Read the sentences below. Each sentence has an error related to purpose or punctuation. Rewrite it correctly, then briefly explain the error.

questions.question: Fix the error in this sentence: What a lovely day.
Fix the error in this sentence: Bring your science project tomorrow?
Fix the error in this sentence: Did any of you break the mirror!
Fix the error in this sentence: Please turn down the volume of your phone?
Fix the error in this sentence: The way she dances looks like sheâ€™s enchanting the audience
Fix the error in this sentence: The weather today is a bit chilly?
